word:
MR No. 1443 - Reflect Christ, the True Light; Lay Up Treasure in Heaven

     (Written December 7, 1903, from "Elmshaven," Sanitarium, California, to John Wessels.) 


     I have recently sent several letters to different members of your family, and had one written to you that I thought had been copied. But I find I did not give it to my workers. I will now write you again.
